name: IceyHot
description:
A 3D platformer submitted for the GMTK Game Jam 2021! 

A game about teamwork, and opposites colliding to complete a goal.

Developed in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam.

You play as Icy and Ignus, who need to reach the top of the tower by utilizing their abilities of fire & ice to overcome obstacles in their way and help each other reach the top!

Controls

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

Click - Fire Flames or create Ice Bridges

E - Swap characters
